title: 20 Perch Land with House for Sale at Nawala
details:
The perfect location to for your residence, with an residential and commercial surrounding.

This land consist of 20 perches with and old house which could be used with major modifications. Suitable location for you to enjoy natures essence also being an ideal investment for a brighter future.

Easy access to both Rajagiriya and Baseline road. Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and all your needs within close range.

Call Linea Property for more inquiries.
